name: Dual Ball
description:
Dual Ball is a game of skill with a simple yet challenging gameplay.
Swipe your finger across the screen to move the two balls at the same time.
Try to get as many stars as possible by finding the fastest way to solve the different levels.

★ 50 levels with increasing difficulty
★ Easy and fun to play
★ Quick games
★ 100% free-to-play

Please let us know if you have any problem.
